bibl.title: The Papyrus Fragments Found in the Judean Desert.
Lectures et relectures de la Bible. Festschrift P.-M. Bogaert
bibl.author: TOV, Emanuel

bibl.note: I. Background. - II. Use of Papyrus. - III. Scribal Conventions. - IV. Text Written on Papyrus. - Pp. 253-255: Appendix. Papyrus Texts Found in the Qumran Caves.
TOV Emanuel, The Papyrus Fragments Found in the Judean Desert.
J.-M. AUWERS et A. WÉNIN (Édd.), Lectures et relectures de la Bible. Festschrift P.-M. Bogaert = Bibliotheca Ephemeridum Theologicarum Lovaniensium. 144 (Leuven, 1999) pp. 247-255.
